DevOps & Cloud Stack

DevOps & Cloud Stack

I design, build, and operate cloud-native infrastructure with a strong focus on automation, reliability, and observability.

Cloud & Infrastructure as Code

  • AWS (EC2, VPC, ELB/ALB, RDS, IAM, CloudWatch, S3, Lambda, API Gateway)
  • Terraform-based IaC for repeatable environments
  • Serverless Framework for Lambda/serverless applications
  • Cost optimization and multi-environment lifecycle management

Containers & Kubernetes

  • Kubernetes on AWS EKS and self-hosted clusters
  • TalosOS clusters on Proxmox with Cilium CNI
  • Workloads defined via Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, Ingress, NetworkPolicies, HPA
  • GitOps-driven workflows for configuration and deployments

CI/CD & Automation

  • GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions, CodeDeploy, CodePipeline
  • Multi-stage Docker builds and promotion workflows
  • Automated testing, security checks, and deployment gates

Observability & Reliability

  • Monitoring with CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana
  • Logging and tracing with CloudTrail, X-Ray, ELK
  • Alerting and SLO-driven incident response

Representative Roles

EventCartel, DcentraLab, TokensFarm, BeeTechy, and others where I led or co-led DevOps and platform engineering for production workloads on AWS and Kubernetes.

Aleksei Tcelishchev
